name: Phantasy Star
description: Originally released on the Sega Master System, Phantasy Star is a pioneer in the role-playing game genre. Relive this classic, where you play as Alis, the fearless female protoganist out to avenge her brother's death by the cruel dictator King Lassic. Guide Alis and her troop through the sprawling environments of the Agol solar system, in an attempt to defeat King Lassic and liberate the people of Agol. Engage in dynamic turn-based combat with dragons, ghouls, giants, and magicians by using unique weapons such as glowing daggers, crossbows, and of course... magic spells.
